meanings.definition: In a way that can be recognized or identified as different from something else.
meanings.sent1: She spoke distinguishably louder than the rest of the group.
meanings.sent2: The new paint color made the house distinguishably brighter.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed distinguishably when it wanted attention.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of freshly baked cookies filled the room distinguishably.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the doorbell was distinguishably clear in the quiet house.

meanings.definition: In a way that is noticeable or distinct.
meanings.sent1: The singer's voice was distinguishably unique among the contestants.
meanings.sent2: The scent of flowers in the garden was distinguishably pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The clown's outfit was distinguishably colorful and mismatched.
meanings.sent4: The stars shone distinguishably bright in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The taste of the homemade pie was distinguishably delicious.
